spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The drow's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15). The drow can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The drow has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the drow to sleep.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the drow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The drow makes two morningstar attacks.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 8}) piercing damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 12} to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}30 ({@damage 4d10 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.
